keywords.name: Theslumbering:Trial of Hypnos
keywords.description: Trials of Hypnos grant a task that must be completed by the end of the battle for a gold reward based on the offering.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:bomb
keywords.description: Bombs are unplayable status cards that damage you.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:drowsy
keywords.description:
You gain 1 fewer [E] but Attacks deal 25% more damage.
This effect stacks.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:parry
keywords.description: If the next attack this turn is fully blocked, the attacker takes the damage instead. If not, take double damage.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:passive
keywords.description:
Unplayable cards that are automatically put into effect at the start of battle.
Cannot be upgraded.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:renewable
keywords.description: Return this card to your discard pile after its power is removed.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:search
keywords.description:
Discard from your draw pile until you find a certain card, or the draw pile is empty.
Keep the last card, regardless of type.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:seed
keywords.description: Seeds are unplayable curse cards that will grow if cared for.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:sleepwalk
keywords.description: Sleepwalks are unplayable Attack cards which deal damage when drawn.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:snooze
keywords.description: Snoozed cards are shuffled back into your draw pile if they are not played.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:stretch
keywords.description: Stretches are Attack cards which Exhaust.

keywords.name: Theslumbering:yawn
keywords.description: Yawns are Skill cards which grant Block and Exhaust.
